thread.title: Convenient stay near Euston Station
thread.title_full: Convenient stay near Euston Station - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: HappyNZTraveller
title: Convenient stay near Euston Station
text: Located in a side street near Euston Station.Busy at all times with no obvious check-in-out desk,but young staff in red T-shirts to help.Rooms fine,bar also,BUT the food we had was atrocious.Flavourless Calamare with flavourless mayonnaise,flavourless Bolognese dish + equally flavourless Singapore noodle dish(no soya sauce on demand) The French founders would be appalled.And again NO TOILET BRUSH!
